title: Reflections on Aristotle's treatise of poesie containing the necessary, rational, and universal rules for epick, dramatick, and the other sorts of poetry : with reflections on the works of the ancient and modern poets, and their faults noted / by R. Rapin.
author: Rapin, René, 1621-1687.
publisher: Printed by T.N. for H. Herringman ...,
notes: Translation of: Réflexions sur la Poétique d'Aristote et sur les ouvrages des poètes anciens & modernes by T. Rymer. Cf. BM.
